meanings.definition: Following or in line with current fashion or style trends.
meanings.sent1: The new jacket is trendier than my old one.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit is always trendier than mine.
meanings.sent3: I tried to look trendier by wearing socks with sandals, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The city streets seemed to be trendier than the quiet countryside.
meanings.sent5: The trendier hairstyles caught everyone's attention at the party.

meanings.definition: More fashionable or stylish than something else.
meanings.sent1: The trendier sunglasses were sold out quickly.
meanings.sent2: His shoes are trendier than mine, but mine are more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: She thought her cat looked trendier with a tiny hat on its head.
meanings.sent4: The trendier car models always attract a lot of buyers.
meanings.sent5: The trendier handbags were on display in the store window.
